articles.description: Follow our live coverage of the 96th Academy Awards, including red carpet fashion, winners and big moments. “Oppenheimer” has the most Oscar nominations.
articles.content: Oppenheimer won best picture while Cillian Murphy, Robert Downey Jr., Emma Stone and DaVine Joy Randolph took home acting trophies at the 96th Academy Awards. See our live coverage below.
